text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar I have been drinking two glasses of whiskey on ice everyday now. Alochol has not been tested an internal disinfectant for covid19 i drink a glass before i go out each time.  I am fine alcoholics are not sick from covid19.  Why drugs? Alcohol is a drug.
